title: Suddenlt cannot send emails
content: Up until yesterday all good. Now cannot send emails from within Thunderbird. If I go to the providers "Webmail" site I can generate and send emails. Error message I get is as follows The mail server responded: mf-505: Sender Policy - Relay Denied. Please verify that your email address is correct in your account settings and try again. I have iinet as the server provider. I have checked their recommended SMTP settings and they are correct. Nothing else has changed since the day before yesterday. No upgrades that I am aware of, so very confused.
creator: fraserd98

title: use super old versions like thunderbird 24.0 or 17.0
content: i hate this "supernova" design is ugly as horseshit, modern versions are laggy and ugly, i want the good old 2013/2012 versions (thunderbird 24.0 to be exactly) i downloaded the version in third-party websites, the app started but when it asked for my e-mail it fails to authenticate or do verification
creator: arthuralvescosta8z

title: After the last thunderbird update (9/28/23, can't see any of my emails
creator: jackopf

title: Blank emails - subject and message pane
content:
I had one email with a blank subject line, and blank message pain, and when viewing the source, just 4 header lines, and no other content.

Following advice from troubleshooting threads, I right-clicked the folder, opened "Properties" and clicked "Repair folder" Now there are more blank emails, blank subject and message pane that were working before.

Attached screenshot of message list pane, showing blank email subject lines.

I'm using Thunderbird 115.3.0 on Mac Ventura 13.5.2
creator: jesvanv
